title: Poster, "Andorra", 1999
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
creditline: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
description: Background: a photograph of the shadow of a man in front of a white-washed cement-block wall of a building on a cobblestoned street. A brush loaded with white paint lies on the ground, while a large spot along the left margin has been whited out with that brush. Over this blanched spot, appears the inscription: "MAX FRISCH / ANDORRA / REGIE: MARCELLO DIAZ / BUHNE/KOSTUME: / GERD WIENER". Further inscriptions in small print are in the upper right, details the days of this Junges Theater Zurich production.
